metadata.title: CVE-2014-1845 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
An unspecified setuid root helper in Enlightenment before 0.17.6 allowslocal users to gain privileges by leveraging failure to properly sanitizethe environment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-1845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

e17 - 0.17.3-3
e17-data - 0.17.3-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: e17 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.17.3-3').
